bill_title: Honoring the Presho Dakota Prairie Bank and Sioux Falls Shenanigans basketball teams.

bill_versions.bill_text: A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring the Presho Dakota Prairie Bank and Sioux Falls Shenanigans basketball teams. WHEREAS, the Presho Dakota Prairie Bank and the Sioux Falls Shenanigans basketball teams won the Class "B" and the Class "A" titles during the recent 2003 South Dakota Amateur Basketball Tournament, respectively; and WHEREAS, the people of the great State of South Dakota enjoy a rich tradition of great basketball with many excellent players, past and present; and WHEREAS, all members of the Presho Dakota Prairie Bank and Sioux Falls Shenanigans basketball teams exhibited a high degree of skill, dedication, and determination in their state championship season: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Seventy-eighth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that the 2003 Presho Dakota Prairie Bank and the 2003 Sioux Falls Shenanigans basketball teams be recognized for their excellence in athletics and sportsmanship.

A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring the Presho Dakota Prairie Bank and Sioux Falls Shenanigans basketball teams. WHEREAS, the Presho Dakota Prairie Bank and the Sioux Falls Shenanigans basketball teams won the Class "B" and the Class "A" titles during the recent 2003 South Dakota Amateur Basketball Tournament, respectively; and WHEREAS, the people of the great State of South Dakota enjoy a rich tradition of great basketball with many excellent players, past and present; and WHEREAS, all members of the Presho Dakota Prairie Bank and Sioux Falls Shenanigans basketball teams exhibited a high degree of skill, dedication, and determination in their state championship season: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Seventy-eighth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that the 2003 Presho Dakota Prairie Bank and the 2003 Sioux Falls Shenanigans basketball teams be recognized for their excellence in athletics and sportsmanship.
